name: Now You See Me Collection
overview: Now You See Me is a series of heist thriller films that focus on the actions of a team of illusionists named "The Four Horsemen" who pull off near impossible heists.

parts.overview: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.
parts.title: Now You See Me

parts.overview: One year after outwitting the FBI and winning the public’s adulation with their mind-bending spectacles, the Four Horsemen resurface only to find themselves face to face with a new enemy who enlists them to pull off their most dangerous heist yet.
parts.title: Now You See Me 2

parts.original_title: Now You See Me: Now You Don't
parts.overview: The original Four Horsemen reunite with a new generation of illusionists to take on powerful diamond heiress Veronika Vanderberg, who leads a criminal empire built on money laundering and trafficking. The new and old magicians must overcome their differences to work together on their most ambitious heist yet.
parts.title: Now You See Me: Now You Don't

parts.overview: The fourth instalment in the franchise. Plot TBA.
parts.title: Untitled Now You See Me 4
